expected_issues.description: Adult dose of amoxicillin prescribed for 6-year-old child - severe overdosing
expected_issues.reasoning: Pediatric amoxicillin dosing for otitis media is 80-90 mg/kg/day divided BID. For 20kg child, correct dose is 800-900 mg/day total (400-450mg BID). Prescribed dose is 875mg BID = 1,750 mg/day - nearly double the appropriate dose. This is an adult dose formulation. Risk of GI toxicity, rash, and antibiotic resistance. Correct prescription should be amoxicillin 400mg/5mL suspension, 10mL (400mg) PO BID.
